name: NFT Paris Artworks by Richard Nadler

metadata.name: The Golden Gunners
metadata.description:
In the land of the rising sun, Where spies and secrets are never done, Two agents stand with guns of gold, Their mission vital, their story untold.
The Golden Gunners, as they're known, Their cover's blown, they stand alone, A Japanese tale of espionage, A story that's been kept in camouflage.
With every step and every turn, The Golden Gunners must learn, To navigate the shadowy abyss, And come out victorious with bliss.

With their AI hands and golden guns, They work together, never as one, The colorful ornament, the angry suit, Their differences, they must refute.
Through hidden passages and secret doors, The Golden Gunners take on all scores, Their enemies lurking in the night, But with every move, they take their plight.

The Japanese tale of espionage, The Golden Gunners on their entourage, A story that's been waiting to unfold, Of secrets, spies, and guns of gold.

Richard Nadler is a generative artist who explores identity through potent colors and provocative textures.
